body: I've been stressing all along that I believe that since we already have a request-specific type, namely `context.Context`, that profiling labels should be associated with that type.  The user should be able to manage profiling labels entirely in conjunction with a `context.Context` value, because that is the value that is already being passed to every request-specific functions.  I agree that this needs to be carefully documented, but the goal should be for it to work for normal cases without requiring a deeper understanding.
